page.title: 19Homelife Around Braydon
page.content: Most housewives here do their own housework and appliances such as washing machines and vacuum cleaners are almost universal. Home freezers are used in many homes. The traditional English Sunday lunch of roast meat and potatoes is very popular. Eating in the garden in fine weather is common with food either cooked in the house or barbequed outside. Occasional friends are invited for an evening meal especially during the long winter evenings. Most of the homes have television and this is the most popular form of home entertainment. Hobbies such as oil-painting, sewing, upholstery and furniture restoring are also practised. Many homes have pets - dogs, cats and rabbits are typical.
